resources.string:
Application for TFG.

Created by Pablo Garcia

V1.0 [2013/2014]
Note is incomplete. Please enter title and body
Pwd is incomplete. Please enter title and password
Recipe is incomplete. Please enter title
Tasks were added to the list in the original format. Now you can modify.
Account were added to the list in the original format. Now you can modify.
Shopping list were added in the original format. Now you can modify.
The exported element was not modified. Recipe were added to the list in the original format.
The exported element was not modified. Note were added to the list in the original format.
The exported element was not modified. Password were added to the list in the original format.

Management of the application is based on six actions:

Add: add a new element.

Look: displays information about the item.

Edit: edit the item.

Share: share an item. You can send a file to a friend by mail, telegram, etc..

IMPORTANT: The text file is not encrypted. The security mechanism is based on the shipping.

Export: generate a text file on the sdcard device.

IMPORTANT: The text file is not encrypted.

Delete: delete the item.

The list appears with the stored notes. To create a new note press "Add" (icon plus). When you create a note, you can:

- Look/Edit: Short press on the note.

- Export/Share /Delete: Long press on the note.

The list appears with the stored passwords. To create a new pwds press "Add" (icon plus). When you create a pwd, you can:

- Look: Short press on the element.

- Edit/Export/Share/Delete: Long press on the element.

The list appears with the stored recipes. To create a new recipe press "Add" (icon plus).When you create a recipe, you can:

- Look/Edit: Short press on the recipe.

- Export/Share/Delete: Long press on the recipe.

The list appears with the stored tasks.To create a new task press "Add" (icon plus). All tasks can be edited and deleted.

To export or share the task list click on the corresponding icon menu.

The list appears with the stored tasks.To create a new account press "Add" (icon plus).When you create an account, you can:

- Look: Short press on the item.

- Edit name/Export/Share/Delete: Long press on the item.

From the look screen you can manage the elements that make up the account and edit your values.

The list appears with the stored shopping list.To create a new shopping list press "Add" (icon plus).When you create shopping list, you can:

- Look: Short press on the item.

- Edit name/Export/Share/Delete: Long press on the item.

From the look screen you can manage the elements that make up the list and edit your values.
